verbose_text: IFN stimulated gene 15 (ISG15) overexpression in TE671 cells caused phosphorylation of IRF-3 (Ser396), JAK2 (Tyr1007/1008), and STAT1 (Tyr701 and Ser727), along with activation of STAT1 dependent genes, such as IRF-3, IFN-beta, IL-8, PKR and OAS, correlating with inhibited JEV replication 20.
